biotools.summary: Fivepseq is a software package for analysis of 5prime endpoints distribution in RNA sequencing datasets. This is particularly useful for techniques that capture 5prime  monophosphorylated RNAs, such as 5PSeq, PARE-seq or GMUC. It may also be useful for ribosome profiling datasets and alike.
